Part 1: What is a Hacker?
Overview
The role of education and awareness in preventing hacks: This node will explore the role of education and awareness in preventing hacks.
The need for constant vigilance and monitoring: This node will explore the need for constant vigilance and monitoring to prevent and detect hacks.
The importance of proactive security measures: This node will examine the importance of proactive security measures to prevent hacks.
The response and aftermath of these incidents (e.g. legal action, changes in security measures): This node will explore the response and aftermath of these incidents.
The consequences of these incidents (e.g. financial losses, compromised personal information): This node will examine the consequences of these incidents.
Examples of high-profile hacks (e.g. Target, Equifax, Yahoo): This node will provide examples of high-profile hacks.
Study Notes Mind Map: "A Hacker's Mind"
Branch 3: Lessons Learned
: High-profile Hacks
